|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash2size = 2 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR2413A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "3300-000531-001" and "REV 001" is silkscreened :on the back of the board in the FCC photos.
There is a '''CopperGate''' CG3011QI-10 HomePNA chip on-board. :FCC photos show the device with a ''Perseus'' SoC, but :this may not reflect reality for production models.
*The PGR2W3800 FCC ID (2006) covers the 3800HGV-B. *The PGR2W3800HP (2008) covers both 3600HGV and 3800HGV-B.
Noted units.. *Assembly Number: 4200-001039-009 (PGR2W3800) **00:1D:5A OUI ('''2Wire''') *Assembly Number: 4200-001039-011 (PGR2W3800) **00:25:3C OUI ('''2Wire''') **34:EF:44 OUI ('''2Wire''')
==Links of Interest== *[http://robertlathanh.com/2011/01/att-u-verse-for-the-curious-consumer-the-residential-gateway-and-wiring-options/ View of the back panel] :This device is/was used for '''AT&T''''s U-verse service. :USB (B) port for slave connection for use of the modem by a PC :Coaxial connection for outbound TV service to U-verse STBs :or usage as the WAN connection
*[http://web.archive.org/web/20140725101446/http://hackingbtbusinesshub.wordpress.com/2011/09/12/the-2wire-family-of-tm32-cpus/ ''The family of TriMedia TM32 CPUs'' - Hacking the 2Wire (on archive.org)] *[http://web.archive.org/web/20140603092442/http://hackingbtbusinesshub.wordpress.com/category/perseus/ ''Discovering 2Wire card edge pinout (for JTAG / I2C)'' - Hacking the 2Wire]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
